lead_paragraph: Soccer's governing body FIFA is cutting off cash to national football associations that fail to meet basic standards of transparency as its new boss works to clean up the sport after years of corruption scandals.

headline.print_headline: Infantino Wields Funding Threat to Make FAs Put Their Houses in Order
headline.main: Infantino Wields Funding Threat to Make FAs Put Their Houses in Order
